definition: lit. as different as sky and earth (idiom)/fig. night and day difference/opposite extremes/a world of difference/a far cry from
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in

sentences.english: Ice caves are very different from normal caves.
sentences.chinese: 冰洞窟與普通的洞窟有着天壤之別。

sentences.english: It is a world away from the world we know.
sentences.chinese: 這是與我們熟知的世界有着天壤之別的世界。

sentences.english: In architecture, there's a big difference between a sketch and a plan.
sentences.chinese: 在建築學裏，草圖和設計圖有着天壤之別。

sentences.english: Red, for example, is often associated with strawberry but also with chilli.
sentences.chinese: 草莓和辣椒同爲紅色，但口味卻有天壤之別。

sentences.english: It's a far cry from Twilight Princess' uncomfortably shoehorned waggling.
sentences.chinese: 這和黃昏公主那種硬塞進去的體感操作有着天壤之別。

sentences.english: But the accommodations provided are worlds apart.
sentences.chinese: 但是這兩個地方提供的住宿服務卻是有着天壤之別。

sentences.english: Contrast that with today's political science.
sentences.chinese: 與今日的政治科學有着天壤之別。

sentences.english: Put side-by-side with future fourth-generation plants, the difference is night and day.
sentences.chinese: 它與未來的第四代核電站有天壤之別。

sentences.english: The inns of the past were certainly different from the deluxe hotels all over the world today.
sentences.chinese: 以前的小酒店與今日遍佈全球的豪華飯店有天壤之別。

definition: to discuss two disparate things together (idiom); to mention on equal terms/to place on a par with/(often with negatives: impossible to mention X in the same breath as Y)
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
to be precisely the same/to be no different
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
closely linked with one another/interlocked/to interrelate
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
